usefulItems: baking sheet and parchment paper, oven
title: Hamburgers

ingredients.content: 16 oz rib eye steak, boneless, do not trim fat, cubed (approx. 1 in.)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
Place steak, garlic, onions, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, egg and bread into mixing bowl and grind <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>.
Shape mixture into 4 patties, 3/4 inch thick. Place on prepared baking sheet and bake for 10-20 minutes (425°F), depending on how rare to well-done you like your burgers.

hintsAndTricks: Burger mixture can be baked in a muffin pan or patties can be grilled on the BBQ.
Foil can be used in place of parchment paper for easy clean up.
